message: Let's be fair, I take the lion's share, but I leave you with something. Accept this and we can both go home happy.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Let's see if you're serious about being fair.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better share than last time.  This is my final offer.
You're still not being fair. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but you need to meet me halfway.
This is my final offer.  I'm not budging any further. It's time to be reasonable.
I'm not going to give you the lion's share, but I'm willing to meet you halfway and split it 50/50. It's time to be reasonable, just like you said.
